titleStmt.title: The certainty and necessity of religion in general, or, The first grounds & principles of humane duty establish'd in eight sermons preach'd at S. Martins in the Fields at the lecture for the year 1697, founded by the Honorable Robert Boyle, Esquire / by Francis Gastrell ...
titleStmt.author: Gastrell, Francis, 1662-1725.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
